execution_plan.description: Compute order counts per product and keep only products whose count equals the maximum count (i.e., the most frequently ordered products).
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id AS s1__product_id, COUNT(*) AS s1__order_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT MAX(product_counts) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS product_counts FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id) AS counts_sub);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product id, name, and price for the products identified as most frequently ordered in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id AS s2__product_id, product_name AS s2__product_name, product_price AS s2__product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.s1__product_id);
